name: Happiness :)
description:
A little game made for the AGDS April Fools Game Jam which's a very chill game, the theme for the game was "switch", the game is inspired from a famous game,you'll notice which game while playing and has been made under 8hours ( please dont criticize the UI im bad with it ;-; ) with the unity engine. It probably have some bugs but at least is playable. Enjoy ! 
PS: Maybe i'll update it and make new features later

NO COMMERCIAL USE
